title: Cant play
body: When i log on it tells me that someone is loged on somewhere else it kicks me out of the game how can i fix this?

replies.body: It sounds to me like someone else might have figured out your login information! Do your best to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can to make sure your account is safe and secure.
